TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RelationalModelValidator extends Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Infrastructure.ModelValidator

summary.para: The validator that enforces rules common for all relational providers.
The service lifetime is . This means a single instance is used by many instances. The implementation must be thread-safe. This service cannot depend on services registered as .
